tickets.title: Lost Keys
tickets.description: I lost my keys to the office.

tickets.title: Screen Crash
tickets.description: My laptop is not responding anymore. Please help me.

tickets.title: Wi-Fi Connectivity Issue
tickets.description: My laptop frequently disconnects from the office Wi-Fi.

tickets.title: Email Not Syncing
tickets.description: My ITicket email is not syncing properly with the server.

tickets.title: VPN Setup Assistance
tickets.description: Need help setting up VPN on my Mac for remote work.

knowledgeBase.title: Email Configuration Guide
knowledgeBase.content: To configure your email, go to Settings > Accounts > Add Account and enter your company email credentials.
